sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import "../styles/formproduct.css"; export default function Formproduct() { // Example product data const products = [ {id: "1" , title: "Cerisier", price: 2.99, note : 5, image: "../src/images/produit1.jpg", }, {id: "2" , title: "Coulis Caramel", price: 13.99, note : 3, image: "produit2.jpg", }, { id: "3" , title: "Douceur exotique", price: 4.99, note : 4, image: "produit3.jpg", }, {id: "4", title: "Blanc Passion", price: 5.99, note: 5, image: "produit4.jpg" }, {id: "5" , title: "Douceur croquante", price: 2.99, note : 3, image: "produit5.jpg",}, { id: "6" , title: "Le Zèbre", price: 19.99, note : 4, image: "produit6.jpg" }, {id: "7" , title: "Coulis Fraise", price: 9.99, note : 4, image: "produit7.jpg", }, {id: "8" , title: "Noir Passion", price: 4.99, note : 5, image: "produit8.jpg", }, { id: "9" , title: "Fantaisie", price: 2.99, note : 5, image: "produit9.jpg",}, {id: "10" , title: "Caramel Salé", price: 14.99, note : 4, image: "produit10.jpg"}, ]; const [filteredProducts, setFilteredProducts] = useState(products); const filterProducts = (title) => { const filtered = products.filter(product => product.title === title); setFilteredProducts(filtered); } const [isFilterActive, setFilteredactive] = useState(false); // This line defines the state variables const toggleFilter = () => { setFilteredProducts(products); // Réinitialisez filteredProducts à sa valeur initiale setFilteredactive(prevState => !prevState); // Toggles the value }; return ( <> {/* Display filtered products */}
{filteredProducts.map(product => (

  • {product.title}
    {product.price}€
    Note des clients : {product.note}
    En savoir plus
    • ))}
    ); }
